display_long_description:
Hexball is a rapid-fire multiplayer VR soccer (football) game where up to 3 players face off to score as many goals as possible in an intense battle of skill and strategy.

Drawing inspiration from high-speed, competitive arenas, Hexball challenges you to master shooting, heading, and goalkeeping in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.

[media]
Take the competition to the next level with Premier League club arenas, kits, and collectibles. Customize your Hexball Arena, represent your favorite team, and dominate the opposition.

[media]

It’s your chance to prove your skills and claim the crown in the ultimate VR Soccer showdown!

[media]
